targets.rawSql:
SELECT avg(center_of_mass_latitude) as center_of_mass_latitude,
       avg(center_of_mass_longitude) as center_of_mass_longitude,
       sensor_name,
       latitude,
       longitude,
       (20 * max(radius_in_km) + 10) as radius,
       avg(heat_index)          as avg_heat_index,
       avg(avg_humidity)        as avg_humidity,
       argMax(value, timestamp) as actual_temperature
FROM sensors.heat_index hi
         join sensors.temperature t on t.group_name = hi.group_name
WHERE group_name = '${group_name}' and timestamp <= now() 
GROUP BY sensor_name, latitude, longitude

panels.description: The Livability Temperature Index (LTI) is a scale from 0 to 10 that represents how comfortable a city's climate is based on temperature. The index considers the average annual temperature and their suitability for comfortable living

targets.rawSql:
with daily_averages as(
    SELECT
        date,
        argMax(avg_temperature, insertion_timestamp) AS daily_avg,
        max(insertion_timestamp) AS last_insertion_time FROM sensors.temperature_daily
    WHERE date > toStartOfYear(now()) and date < toStartOfYear(now() + interval '1' year)
    AND group_name = '$group_name'
    GROUP BY date
    ORDER BY date
)
select
    countIf(daily_avg >= 15 AND daily_avg <= 25) as CS_days_in_range,
    countIf(daily_avg > 35) + countIf(daily_avg < 5) as ETP_days_out_of_range,
    stddevPop(daily_avg) as VP_std_dev,
    (avg(daily_avg) - 15) / (25 - 15) * 100 as OATS,
    count() as total_days,
    greatest(0, round((2 * CS_days_in_range - ETP_days_out_of_range - VP_std_dev + OATS) / 4)) as comfort_score
from daily_averages;

panels.title: Current Year Livability Temperature Index (LTI)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp, heat_index, avg_temperature
FROM sensors.heat_index
WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime AND group_name = '${group_name}'
ORDER BY timestamp;

SELECT
    date,
    argMax(avg_temperature, insertion_timestamp) AS Temperature
FROM sensors.temperature_5m
WHERE date >= $__fromTime AND date <= $__toTime AND group_name = '${group_name}'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
LIMIT 30;

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    toDate(timestamp) AS date,
    avg(value) AS mean_daily_temperature
FROM sensors.temperature
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.query:
SELECT
    toMonth(timestamp) AS month,
    avg(value) AS monthly_mean_temperature
FROM sensors.temperature
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month

    toMonth(timestamp) AS month,
    avg(value) AS monthly_mean_temperature

GROUP BY month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    min(value) as min_river_level,
    avg(value) AS avg_river_level,
    max(value) as max_river_level
FROM sensors.river_level
where sensor_name = '${sensor_name_river_level}' and timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime

select
    avg(o3) as avg_o3,
    avg(no2) as avg_no2,
    avg(so2) as avg_so2,
    avg(pm10) as avg_pm10,
    avg(pm25) as avg_pm25,
    multiIf(avg_o3 < 50, 1,
            avg_o3 < 100, 2,
            avg_o3 < 130, 3,
            avg_o3 < 240, 4,
            avg_o3 < 380, 5,
            6) as o3_level,
    multiIf(avg_no2 < 40, 1,
            avg_no2 < 90, 2,
            avg_no2 < 120, 3,
            avg_no2 < 230, 4,
            avg_no2 < 340, 5,
            6) as no2_level,
    multiIf(avg_so2 < 100, 1,
            avg_so2 < 200, 2,
            avg_so2 < 350, 3,
            avg_so2 < 500, 4,
            avg_so2 < 750, 5,
            6) as so2_level,
    multiIf(avg_pm10 < 20, 1,
            avg_pm10 < 40, 2,
            avg_pm10 < 50, 3,
            avg_pm10 < 100, 4,
            avg_pm10 < 150, 5,
            6) as pm10_level,
    multiIf(avg_pm25 < 10, 1,
            avg_pm25 < 20, 2,
            avg_pm25 < 25, 3,
            avg_pm25 < 50, 4,
            avg_pm25 < 75, 5,
            6) as pm25_level,
    greatest(o3_level, no2_level, so2_level, pm10_level, pm25_level) as air_quality_index,
    latitude,
    longitude,
    sensor_name
from sensors.air_quality
where timestamp >= $__fromTime and timestamp <= $__toTime
group by sensor_name, latitude, longitude

SELECT
    timestamp,
    sensor_uuid,
    GREATEST(
        multiIf(o3 <= 50, 1, o3 <= 100, 2, o3 <= 130, 3, o3 <= 240, 4, 5),
        multiIf(no2 <= 40, 1, no2 <= 90, 2, no2 <= 120, 3, no2 <= 230, 4, 5),
        multiIf(so2 <= 100, 1, so2 <= 200, 2, so2 <= 350, 3, so2 <= 500, 4, 5),
        multiIf(pm10 <= 20, 1, pm10 <= 40, 2, pm10 <= 50, 3, pm10 <= 100, 4, 5),
        multiIf(pm25 <= 10, 1, pm25 <= 20, 2, pm25 <= 25, 3, pm25 <= 50, 4, 5)
    ) AS EAQI
FROM sensors.air_quality
ORDER BY timestamp, sensor_uuid

panels.title: European Air Quality Index - Real Time

targets.rawSql:
select
    avg(o3),
    avg(no2),
    avg(so2),
    avg(pm10),
    avg(pm25)
from sensors.air_quality
where timestamp >= $__fromTime and timestamp <= $__toTime and sensor_name = '${sensor_name_air_quality}'
group by sensor_name, latitude, longitude

select
    avg(o3) as avg_o3,
    avg(no2) as avg_no2,
    avg(so2) as avg_so2,
    avg(pm10) as avg_pm10,
    avg(pm25) as avg_pm25,
    sensor_name
from sensors.air_quality
where timestamp >= $__fromTime and timestamp <= $__toTime and sensor_name = '${sensor_name_air_quality}'
group by sensor_name, latitude, longitude
